c74object.name: ears.istft~
c74object.description: Computes the inverse of a Short-Time Fourier Transform via overlap-add

inlet.digest: Buffer containing input magnitudes or real (x) parts, one bin per channel
Buffer containing input phases (in the angleunit coordinate) or imaginary (y) parts, one bin per channel

outlet.digest: Output audio buffer - or output magnitudes, or real (x) parts
outlet.description: If the cpxout attribute is not set, the object outputs a buffer with the reconstructed audio content. If the cpxout attribute is set, then the output is the first component of the complex signal (in cartesian or polar form, depending on the polarin attribute).

If the cpxout attribute is set, then the second inlet outputs the second component of the complex signal (in cartesian or polar form, depending on the polarin attribute). Phases are output according to the angleunit coordinate.

method.name: list/llll
method.description: A list or llll with buffer names will trigger the buffer processing and output the processed buffer names (depending on the naming attribute).

attribute.name: cpxout
attribute.description: Output complex data instead of real-valued audio samples. This attribute is static and can only be entered in the object box.

attribute.name: fullspectrum
attribute.description: Output full spectrum; if not set, it will output the first half of the spectrum only.

attribute.name: polarin
attribute.description: Input data in polar coordinates, instead of cartesian ones. Default is 1.

attribute.name: polarout
attribute.description: Output data in polar coordinates, instead of cartesian ones. Default is 0.

attribute.name: sr
attribute.description: Sets the sample rate. Leave 0 to infer it from the input STFT buffers.

attribute.name: unitary
attribute.description: Toggles the unitary normalization of the Fourier Transform (so that the if coincides with its inverse up to conjugation).

entry.name: Inlet 1 (symbol)
entry.description: Buffer containing input magnitudes or real (x) parts, one bin per channel.

entry.name: Inlet 2 (symbol)
entry.description: Buffer containing input phases (in the angleunit coordinate) or imaginary (y) parts, one bin per channel.

entry.description: Output audio buffer - or output magnitudes, or real (x) parts. If the cpxout attribute is not set, the object outputs a buffer with the reconstructed audio content. If the cpxout attribute is set, then the output is the first component of the complex signal (in cartesian or polar form, depending on the polarin attribute).

entry.name: Outlet 2 (symbol)
entry.description: Output phases or imaginary (y) parts. If the cpxout attribute is set, then the second inlet outputs the second component of the complex signal (in cartesian or polar form, depending on the polarin attribute). Phases are output according to the angleunit coordinate.
